item.description: We will be meeting on Friday, March 2nd, to view the art, meet up with friends and enjoy the music of The Andy Baer Jazz Ensemble. Should be an enjoyable evening. Cost is free with an MFA Membership or Admisison Ticket. Admission tickets can be reserved at your local library at low or no charge. Carpooling will be arranged closer to the date. Check out the website www.mfa.org under Special Events for more detail. Food and drinks will be available for purchase. Event runs from 5:30-9:30. Susan
item.name: MFA First Friday, March 2nd
